Title: FG to build 4,000 telecom towers, targets 20m Nigerians
Summary: Federal Government has unveiled plans to construct 4,000 new telecommunication towers across the country . It is part of a major connectivity drive aimed at linking 20 million Nigerians currently without access to mobile networks .

Title: Protecting financial market, consumers from tech-driven scams
Summary: Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has issued a warning regarding the proliferation of Artificial Intelligence-generated scams . The recent warning by the SEC has been issued by the Commission . The SEC has also issued a statement about the threat posed by AI-generated scams .

Title: Foundation awards scholarships to indigent students
Summary: Foundation awards scholarships to indigent students . A non-profit organisation committed to supporting academically gifted but financially disadvantaged young Nigerian women . The foundation awards scholarships .

Title: Abia govt pays N20m compensation to victims of collapsed billboard in Aba
Summary: Abia govt pays N20m compensation to victims of collapsed billboard in Aba . Abia State Government has paid a total of N20 million as compensation . The billboard collapse occurred near Ogbonnaya .

Title: Tuberculosis killed 1.23 million globally in 2024, says WHO
Summary: Tuberculosis remains the world’s leading infectious killer, claiming an estimated 1.23 million lives last year, the World Health Organisation says . The disease is the world's leading killer, with 1.24 million people dying globally in 2024 .

Title: Troops rescue 74 NYSC members from possible abduction in Borno
Summary: Troops rescue 74 NYSC members from possible abduction in Borno State . Troops rescued 74 members of the National Youth Service Corps (NYSC) from a possible abduction by Boko Haram/ISWAP terrorists .

Title: Wike, soldiers altercation: No officer or soldier on lawful duty’ll be punished — DEFENCE Minister
Summary: Minister of Defence, Mohammad Badaru Abubakar, said no officer or soldier on lawful duty would be punished as a result of the altercation that ensued between soldiers and the minister of the FCT, Barr Nyesom Wike, in Abuja .

Title: Democracy suffocates when media is stifled —Anaba, NGE BOSS
Summary: EZE ANABA addressed the opening ceremony of the 21st All Nigerian Editor's Conference . He said democracy suffocates when media is stifled — Anaba, NGE boss .

Title: Employers raise alarm over threats to industrial peace
Summary: The 46th AGM of the Chemical and Non-Metallic Products Employers’ Federation, CANMPEF, held in Lagos, lived up to expectations . Employers raise alarm over threats to industrial peace .

Title: Education: Assessing Okpebholo’s one year in office
Summary: Okpebholo took office as the governor of Edo State on November 12, 2024 . He said education would be one of his priority areas .

Title: Adamawa ADC chairman resigns as Fintiri’s aide
FG scraps mother tongue as teaching language in primary schools
N’Assembly officials jailed for N4.8m job scam
Robbers shoot Lagos hairstylist to death
